oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elevated Fecal Calprotectin in the Second or Third Trimester of Pregnancy Predicts Preterm Delivery in Women with IBD
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Huang, Vivian
Elahi, Shokrollah
Madsen, Karen
Fedorak, Richard
Dieleman, Levinus
Wine, Eytan
Lumb, Rowan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to evaluate whether a FCP measurement in the 2nd or 3rd trimester of pregnancy in women with IBD can predict preterm delivery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
Crohn's disease
pregnancy
ulcerative colitis
cohort studies

biomarkers

faecal calprotectin
